items.name: VA50 Fuel Tank - Slave
items.description:
-VA50 Slave cylinder without vapour take off
-Stainless Steel gas cylinder with enhanced safety features
-Fitted with quick shut-off valves
-TEMA or REGO fittings
-With padded tank cover
-Impact absorbing rubber protector for top ring
-Certified according to ADR regulations with German TÜV and "Pi" marked
